title: Portfolio App
description: Angular portfolio with localization, certificates, and CV. Designed with a retrowave aesthetic.

detailedDescription.title: Overview
detailedDescription.content: Portfolio web app created using Angular 20. It showcases projects, certificates, and includes my CV in multiple languages. The site is styled with a retrowave-inspired theme and is fully responsive.

detailedDescription.title: Key Features
detailedDescription.content: Supports internationalization (i18n) with multiple language options, responsive layout for different devices, modular and scalable architecture, and smooth visual transitions.

detailedDescription.title: Technical Stack
detailedDescription.content: Angular 20, TypeScript, SCSS, Angular Router, modern CSS (Flexbox, Grid). Built using Angular best practices for production-ready deployment.

title: Modern Store
description: Full-stack e-commerce platform with Angular frontend and modern UI/UX design.

detailedDescription.title: Overview
detailedDescription.content: Modern Store is a full-featured e-commerce platform built with Angular, featuring product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, and payment integration.

detailedDescription.title: Key Features
detailedDescription.content: Comprehensive product management system, shopping cart functionality, user authentication and profile management, responsive design for all devices, and modern UI/UX with smooth animations.

detailedDescription.title: Technical Stack
detailedDescription.content: Built with Angular, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. Features component-based architecture, state management, and RESTful API integration.
